DOC.brief_title: Clinical Characteristics Practice Patterns T2DM Patients Treated With OADs Japan : Analysis Medical Health Care Database MDV
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients T2DM ( ICD code : E11 E14 ) . Patients must first prescription ( defined index date* ) study drug 01/01/2014 30/09/2016 . Patients must least 6 month enrolment verify presence record except study drug prescription within database ( look back period ) prior index date drug . Exclusion criterion : Patients 40 year time diagnosis diabetes . Patients record type 1 diabetes mellitus . Patients prescribe study drug 6 month prior index date drug . Patients whose mean visit interval 92 day
